constituent: park, pent in, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth, scarf
koohiiStory1: A nice picnic pent up in the park, with your crock pot and scarf (picnic blanket).
koohiiStory2: There was a homeless man living in a box at the park so I gave him a lidded crock filled with hot curry tied with a scarf...
